title: League of Legends | How To Fix Unspecified Error Check Logs | 2018

embed.description: I've tried plenty of different solutions to try fixing this problem and I ended up fixing it pretty simply just by messing with some things and finding my own solution. I know there's still a bit of people having this problem and it is actually annoying so i wanted to help the one that don't know about this way and hopefully it works for those the main solutions didn't...

body: Here is a video showing you how to fix the unspecified error.

replies.body: So just a little info on why this worked. In his case, the launcher wasn't worked due to its dependency on DirectX being able to launch the client. WIthout his DirectX working the client was crashing, but since DirectX isn't our product the client couldn't figure out why. Essentially, this issue was centered around DirectX not working correctly, which would effect a lot of different things.
